scripts.global-install: bun i && concurrently "bun install:packages" "bun install:plugins" "bun install:core"
scripts.install:packages: concurrently -n 'package:discord,package:socket,package:utils' -c '#007755,#2f6da3,#550077' 'cd packages/discord && bun install' 'cd packages/socket && bun install' 'cd packages/utils && bun install'
scripts.install:plugins: concurrently -n 'plugins:discord,plugins:socket' -c '#007755,#2f6da3' 'cd plugins/base && bun install' 'cd plugins/tickets && bun install'
scripts.lint:packages: concurrently -n 'package:discord,package:socket,package:utils' -c '#007755,#2f6da3,#550077' 'cd packages/discord && bun lint' 'cd packages/socket && bun lint' 'cd packages/utils && bun lint'
scripts.lint:plugins: concurrently -n 'plugins:discord,plugins:socket' -c '#007755,#2f6da3' 'cd plugins/base && bun lint' 'cd plugins/tickets && bun lint'
